Your life, your practice

Podcast #4 - In Between

Inspired by Michael Nobbs tiny adventures, I decide to have my own during August.

In Between, it’s about the space between the digital 0 and 1 and how this leads to the Chinese Philosopher Mencius, who wrote around 200 b.C. why – regarding to the nature of men, it’s so hard to return again to MS-DOS and mono-tasking.

Enjoy your practice.
